column2: there is a basket full of menus by the cashier. I got the crunchy chicken sandwich with quinoa and chips. The food came quickly and it was delicious! The ingredients used were fresh
column3: and the bun was so good! It's perfectly crunchy of the outside
column4: and soft on the inside. For around $12
column5: I got a lot of food! I could only finish half of the sandwich and took the other half home.
